title: B.F. Skinner Raised His Daughter in a Skinner Box?
subtitle: Did psychologist B.F. Skinner raise his daughter in a 'Skinner box'?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Psychologist B. F. Skinner raised his own daughter in a "Skinner box"; as a result, she grew up psychologically damaged, sued her father, and committed suicide.
